Information.p: The terms are used for the CITS eHealth1

Entry.Definition: A collection or compilation of recorded information about a patient in connection with healthcare, ; the patient record is the principal repository for information concerning a patient’s health care.
The specification for eHealth1 is used.
A Case is a folder located in the ”Data” folder within the representation and may contain any number of Sub-cases and Documents.
A Sub-case is a folder located in a Case folder within the representation and must contain at least one Document.
Each Case or Sub-case can contain individual Data Files that are related logically and together form Documents (e.g. a book, video, image and annotation, document and audio notes).

Data Files are components that contain data and have associated MIME file types. A Data File can be a single bit stream or can encapsulate bit streams and attributes according to a standard such as a DICOM or MP4.
Data specifies that the section describes the data in the package/representation.
